1.「古き踊り子の チカラの根源。| 軽やかでもあり チカラ強くもある……| 神妙な: The power of the old dancer... Light and|mighty... A mysterious, ancient song...

2.「やっぱり来たのね <cs_pchero>。| 足音を聞いただけでも わかるわ。: I knew you'd come<cs_pchero>I don't know. I can hear their footsteps...|It seems to have grown quite a bit...

5.「怨霊つきを 引き寄せてしまったようね……。| やっぱり 復活を邪魔されないよう: I think I've attracted a grudge match. I knew|it. He's making us attack the best dancers so|they won't interfere with his resurrection.

6.「コクエンオウ……サマ……| メイ……レイ……: Ko Kuen Oo Sama| May Ray

7.「グゥウウウ……コロ…セ！| オド…リコ……コロ……セ！: Goooooooo... Colo... Se! Odo... Rico...|Colo... Se!

8.「３体か……。| さすがに 一度で浄化するのは| 無理があるわね。引きずり出すだ: Three of them... It's impossible to cleanse|them all at once... If we can just drag them|out...

10.「<cs_pchero>。悪いけど……チカラを貸して！| この球の中に 怨霊を: <cs_pchero>I'm sorry. I'm sorry, but... I need your|help! I've trapped a grudge in this sphere.|.... I can't cleanse all three at once...

12.「大丈夫……この縛霊球の中は 存外に広いのよ。| 舞い踊るのに 不自由は しない:
It's okay... The inside of this binding|sphere is much larger than it seems... I'm|sure you'll have no trouble dancing around...|
|But... We can't hold on much longer.

13.「くうっ……遅いわよっ……！| さすがの私も……そろそろ……限界っ。| 今度こそ: Damn it... You're late... I'm late, too...|It's time to go to ...... This time... Kill|it... Please...

15.「ありがとう <cs_pchero>。どうやら 怨霊を| 浄化できたようね。あな: Thank you<cs_pchero>I'm sorry. Apparently, I was able to purge|the grudge... Thanks to you, those people are|safe and sound...

16.「……<cs_pchero>。| ここまで 巻き込んでしまったからには| あなた: <cs_pchero>I'm sorry. Now that I've gotten you into this|mess, I'm gonna tell you everything...

17.「書き置きしておいたように……| 私は 会いにきたの。| ここに眠っている かつ: Like I left a note... I'm here to see... To|the one who used to sleep here...

18.「……と言っても 気休めなんだけどね。| 肉体も霊魂も ここには いないのだから: ... But it's only a comfort. There is no|body, no spirit here.

19.「もうわかっていると思うけど| 私は ただの踊り子じゃないわ。| 歌や踊りのチカ: As you probably know by now, I'm not just a|dancer... I'm a dancer who uses the power of|song and dance to banish grudges...

20.「怨霊の王たる 黒怨王と戦ってきた| いにしえの踊り子の一族……。| その最後の: A clan of ancient dancers who have fought|against the Black Grudge King... The last of|the living...

21.「私には 果たすべき悲願があってね。| 一族に封印されては 復活をくり返してきた:
I have a vow to fulfill... I have a vow to|completely purge the Black Grudge King... who|has been sealed away by my family and|
|repeatedly resurrected.

22.「でも……私は 失敗したの。| 私は 合方を……アイツを犠牲にして……| 彼ごと: But... I failed... I lost my partner... I|have to sacrifice him... I have no choice but|to seal the Black Grudge King with him.

23.「だから……黒怨王の復活を感じたとき| 絶対 カタキを討たなきゃ……って思ったの: So... When I sensed the resurrection of the|Black Grudge King, I knew I had to take down|Kataki. I thought...

24.「ナッチョスは 何も聞かず 協力してくれたわ。 | 私の合方に ふさわしい素質を:
Natchos didn't ask any questions, he just|agreed to help. I'm going to find someone who|has the right qualities to be my partner and|
|raise him...

25.「あなたは それらを 見事にこなし成長した。| 最初は認めたくなかったけど……あ: You've done all of that and more. I didn't|want to admit it at first, but... Your talent|is second to none. ......

26.「でもね。この前 カイユの葉を渡されたとき| なんだか 怖くなったのよ……。|:
... The other day, when you gave me the|cayenne leaves, it kind of freaked me out. I|really don't know if I should involve you in|
|this.

27.「じつは アイツからも 同じように| カイユの葉をもらったことが あってね……。: You know, I once got some cayenne leaves from|that guy as well. I feel like I'm making the|same mistake again...

28.「だけど その成長ぶりを見て 決心がついたわ。| 今は あなたのチカラを信じ 前:
But seeing how you've grown, I've made up my|mind... Now I believe in your power, and I'm|moving forward... This is no time to be|
|afraid...

29.「だから……どうかお願いよ <cs_pchero>。| 今度こそ 黒怨王を 完全: So I'm begging you<cs_pchero>This time... This time, I will completely|purge the Black Grudge King... I want you to|be my partner.<yesno><close>

30.「……そう言われても 仕方ないわ。 | カタキ討ちなんて ひとりでするのがスジよ:
I don't... I don't blame you... The only way|to defeat the Black Fiend is by yourself...|But the Black Grudge King can only be|
|defeated by two...

31.「そして さっきの戦いで 確信したのよ。 | こんなに 頼りになる合方は 他にい: And after that fight, I'm convinced...|There's no one I can rely on more... You're|the only one... So ......<yesno><close>

32.「……確かに 私は かつての合方を| 見殺しにしてしまった。でも……| あなたは: ... It's true that I left my former partner|to die... But... I will protect you even if|it costs me my life...

33.「それに このまま 黒怨王を放っておけば| 無関係の踊り子が 犠牲になってしまう:
Besides, if we let the Black Grudge King go|on like this, unrelated dancers will be|sacrificed... I can't let that happen... So|
|please!

34.「そもそも この前まで あなたの方から| 合方になりたい……って言ってた気が……:
I thought you were the one who said you|wanted to be my partner. I thought you said|you wanted to be a kappo. I thought you|
|wanted to be my partner.

36.「……ありがとう。あなたになら 安心して| 背中を あずけることが できるわ。: ... Yes... I can trust you with my back...

37.「本当はもっと ふたりで 修練を積みたいけど| 黒怨王の復活は 近いわ。あなたに:
I really want us to train together more, but|the resurrection of the Black Grudge King...|I need you to prepare for that as soon as|
|possible...

38.「そうね……いったん 獅子門のテントに| 戻りましょ。くわしい話は その時にさせ: Well... We'll go back to the Lion's Gate|tent... We'll talk about it later...

40.「でも…… 一度に ３体も現れるなんて。| ……モタモタしてる 余裕はないか。: But... Three of them at once... And... I|can't afford to be slow.

41.「その悲願を果たすべく 私は かつて| 合方と共に 復活した黒怨王に挑んだ……。: In order to fulfill that longing, I|challenged the Black Grudge King who had once|resurrected with Godo...

42.「ただ それには どうしても| 新しい合方が必要だった……。: But to do that, I really needed a new way of|combining...

43.「ナッチョスには 教えてないけど| 転職の時の通過儀礼も その後の怨霊退治も|:
I didn't tell Natchos this, but the rite of|passage when you change jobs and the grudge|elimination afterwards is a ritual to release|
|the power of exorcism...
